example.text: I'm a Head Start baby. Nuevo Mexicanos know that investing in our kids is an investment in our future. The Republican Default on America steals that future from thousands of children in New Mexico. [[url]]

I spoke against the Republican bill that creates more chaos at the border and does nothing to fix our broken immigration system. Instead, let’s work together to create real reforms, improve security, and provide a path to citizenship. [[url]]

Last week was historic for Tribal Nations, from New Mexico to Hawaii to Alaska. Congress passed my bill, the STOP Act , to end the illegal export of stolen tribal cultural items and return them to their rightful owners.

The Republicans are waging culture wars against patriotic women, patriotic Latinos, Blacks, Native Americans, Asians, gays, lesbians, and trans Americans who serve in our military. These patriotic men and women are willing to fight and die for our country.

I'm a Head Start baby. Nuevo Mexicanos know that investing in our kids is an investment in our future. The Republican Default on America steals that future from thousands of children in New Mexico. [[url]]

HR 1156 - China Financial Threat Mitigation Act of 2023 , to protect the American economy from global economic threats from China. HR 366 - Korean American VALOR Act , to make Naturalized Korean American Vietnam War veterans eligible for VA benefits.

Last week was historic for Tribal Nations, from New Mexico to Hawaii to Alaska. Congress passed my bill, the STOP Act , to end the illegal export of stolen tribal cultural items and return them to their rightful owners.
